request.description:
Standard GET Consent test

Deliver a GET Consent Request where the consent-Id equals the consent Id from the Account Information Consent Response of test case AIS/Consents/Create/002.

Consent status test - received

Deliver a GET Consent Status Request where the consent-Id equals the consentId from the Account Information Consent Response of test case AIS/Consents/Create/002.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("The consent status has changed to: valid");

request.description: Processing of a Consent request that needs authentication. The redirect SCA approach is selected. A link to start the authorisation is contained in the request.

Processing of a service request that needs authentication. The PSU has not yet been authorised. Embedded SCA Approach selected. The PSU has more than one embedded method available. PSU authenticaton required for the SCA selection to be applied. Missing authorisation data may be delivered at the same time as an authorisation sub-resource is created.

Processing of a service request that needs authentication. The PSU has not yet been authorised. Embedded SCA Approach selected. The PSU has more than one embedded method available. PSU authenticaton required for the SCA selection to be applied. Missing authorisation data may be delivered at the same time as an authorisation sub-resource is created.

exec: pm.test("SCA method as indicated by the request field \"authenticationMethodId\"", function () {

request.description: Read Transaction List Request including the optional query parameter '?withBalance=true'

exec: pm.test("Response is in format camt.52", function () {
// both variables are needed, because this test could be run with the evironment variables collection and with data file as well
// so it is important to check both possible approaches
const paymentProductSupportedIterationVar = pm.iterationData.get("sepa-credit-transfers-supported");    // get var from data file for the current iteration
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("The payment status has changed to: AcceptedSettlementCompleted");

request.description:
Processing of a Payment Initiation Request for a single payment with service sepa-credit-transfer with the body in XML format.
PayInitReqStart-1.1: It has to be checked that for each Single Payment product/endpoint supported by the ASPSP according to IO2 a payment resource can be successfully created.
Processing of a Get Transaction Status Request after a Payment Initiation Request for a single payment with product sepa-credit-transfer with the body in XML format.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("The payment status has changed to: AcceptedSettlementCompleted");
